name: Golf Shiyouyo: Course Data Shuu: Adventure-hen
overview: This Courses Data disc is an append disc for Golf Shiyou yo (known as Tee Off in the west) which adds five new courses. This append disc adds two playable modes: Free Round and Club House Express. Free Round mode includes these games: Point Tourney Supports 1-4 players and focuses on a single hole. Points are awarded in this order: 5 (for Albatross), 4 (for Eagle), 3 (for Birdie), 2 (for Par), 1 (for Bogey), and 0 (for Double Bogey or less) Stroke Play Supports 1-4 players and focuses on an 18 hole course. Number of playable characters and characters themselves are selected before choosing a course from the world globe map screen. Match Play Supports 1-4 players and has several different sub-modes to choose from, namely Single, Four Sume, Three Sume, Four Ball, Best Ball 1VS2, and Best Ball 1VS3. Five new courses included in this append disc are: Fiji course, Nepal course, Egypt course, Mexico course, and Canada course.
